main_definition: Class refers to a group of students who are taught together or an instructional session, as well as various context-specific meanings related to grouping, categorization, or learning.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A group of people assembled for educational purposes
meanings_and_examples.example: The students are divided into two classes for the morning session.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A specific time allocated for teaching and learning
meanings_and_examples.example: Math class starts at 9 AM every day.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A category or division based on common characteristics
meanings_and_examples.example: There are different classes of drugs, such as over-the-counter medications and prescription medications.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An organized group of people with a shared interest or goal
meanings_and_examples.example: The book club is considered an informal class where members read and discuss books together.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A course of study in an educational institution, often leading to certification or qualification
meanings_and_examples.example: She completed her business management class at the local college.
